entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is interested in the Sneakoscope and asks questions about it. She stands up to get a better look.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron mentions that he bought a cheap Sneakoscope and it went haywire. He was trying to send Harry's present to him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the recipient of Ron's present and Hermione asks if Ron did anything untrustworthy when sending it.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is a horse that Ron was trying to use to send Harry's present to him.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as someone who might be woken up by the Sneakoscope.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's old socks are used to deaden the sound of the Sneakoscope.

entities.name: dervish and banges
entities.description: Dervish and Banges is a store in Hogsmeade that sells magical instruments.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George told Ron about Dervish and Banges.
